I never knew this before and i guess i'm just guessing that it is true now, but as the credits were rolling on this movie Reservoir Dogs, i saw his name, Chris Penn and i started thinking, no i couldn't be that he is Sean Penns brother could it? then you think about it and they do share a family resemblence.
